hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LAST_DATASET_MODIFICATION_COMMIT=`git blame --abbrev=39 build-spec.json | grep source_dataset_s3_url | cut -f 1 -d ' '`
docker exec jenkins /usr/local/bin/aws s3api head-object --bucket $stack_s3_bucket --key "data/${LAST_DATASET_MODIFICATION_COMMIT}/javabins_rekeyed.tar.gz" || not_exist=true if [ $not_exist ]; then echo $LAST_DATASET_MODIFICATION_COMMIT > toBeRekeyed.txt echo "Will rekey new dataset." else echo $LAST_DATASET_MODIFICATION_COMMIT > alreadyRekeyed.txt echo "Skipping rekey new dataset." fi
